document_data.name: Stabilize
document_data.mainbody: '''''Stabilize''''' was a [[divine]] [[conjuration]] [[spell]] that pulled creatures from the brink of death in the heat of battle. The spell was granted to [[cleric]]s and [[paladin]]s by their patron deities.
document_data.Effects: When the spell was uttered, it could affect all creatures within {{SI|50|ft|long=yes}} from the caster. It produced a wave of [[positive energy]] that stabilized all downed creatures on the brink of death, ensuring their survival. The energy also dealt minuscule damage to all [[undead]] creatures within the same radius.
document_data.Components: The spell required only a [[Somatic component|somatic]] and [[verbal component]]s.
